layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x48
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x48
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x32
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 552x32 [border: (3px solid #FF0000)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (3,3) size 546x26
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 546x22
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 542x22 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (1,1) size 540x19
                text run at (1,1) width 349: "This tests the 'style' attribute of TABLE. This table should "
                text run at (350,1) width 191: "have a solid medium red border"
